availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Martin Young (Hopkins County, Ky, saddler )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, saddler. North Carolina native. Married to Judith Young. Father of James C. Young, Thomas R. Young, Mary M. Young, Martha W. Young, and Elizabeth J. Young. Married to Julia Ann DeMoss Young. Father of Zeno F. Young, Nancy Young, John W. Young, Elnora M. Young, Laura A. Young, and Walter M. Young. Saddler in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Saddler in Madisonville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 52B.
